4.19. foundations.ui.common¶

common.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines Foundations package ui common utilities objects.

Others:

4.19.2. Functions¶

foundations.ui.common.centerWidgetOnScreen(widget, screen=None)[source]¶

This definition centers the given Widget on the screen.

Parameters:
  • widget – Current Widget. ( QWidget )
  • screen – Screen used for centering. ( Integer )
Returns:

Definition success. ( Boolean )
foundations.ui.common.QWidgetFactory(uiFile=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This definition is a class factory creating QWidget classes using given ui file.

Parameters:
  • uiFile – Ui file. ( String )
  • *args – Arguments. ( * )
  • **kwargs – Keywords arguments. ( ** )
Returns:

QWidget class. ( QWidget )
